preference.name: TCAA113_DWFX_generation_mode
preference.preference_description: Specifies the translator to be used to generate DWFx auxiliary files. Possible values: 0 - Use PLOT command to generate DWFx files (Default) 1 - Use PUBLISH command to generate DWFx files
